title: Flaco's Dance Factory
body:
Hello! Welcome to FLACO'S DANCE FACTORY! This area of our site is dedicated to continuing education, choreographic services and entertainment for dance-interested adults. Are you ready for SALSA: HOT, HOT, HOT ?? It's our monthly salsa meet-up and dance party! We feature some of the very best of Philly's Latin bands, and the nicest crowd anywhere!! Be a part of the fun...For the month of November, we feature the music of... It's coming back on Friday, November 17, 2017! Get your tickets right here by clicking this PayPal button TODAY!!*
If you have survived any of our level one classes, we invite you to return for level 2 in the Fall of 2017, and to make it easier for you, we are having a Fall Semester Pre-Sale ONLY FOR ALUMS! Just click the PayPal button below to be enrolled in the upcoming Session of Beginner Salsa 2 or Mo' Betta Bop, both starting in September. Complete your enrollment TODAY and get two (2) EXTRA CLASSES with each pre-registration! The fun starts NOW!!! For more information on all classes, click here Your class pass is good for entry into all of our classes and never expires! Get yours today!!
\*$2.00 service fee for online purchase included
